alert.note: Alert for Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kimball County through 345 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Kimball Airport, or 8 miles south of Kimball, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kimball, Oliver Campground, Oliver Reservoir and Kimball Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 12 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
